segments.text: Hi Chris . I am glad to see you . Can you help me with my new computer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When did you buy your new computer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bought it yesterday afternoon and they delivered it this morning at 10:45 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am not sure . I just can't connect to the net .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh this is the new little EEE notebook from Asks . How much did you pay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very nice . I am sure we will sort out your Internet in no time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am on my way to the doctor now , but I should be back in about 45 minutes . Can I come back at around 3:15 ?
segments.speaker: S2
